name: get_activity_by_key
description: Find an activity by its key.

name: get_activity_by_type
description: Find a random activity with a given type.

name: get_activity_by_participants
description: Find a random activity with a given number of participants.

participants.description: The number of people that this activity could involve [0, n].

name: get_activity_by_price
description: Find an activity with a specified price.

price.description: A factor describing the cost of the event with zero being free [0, 1].

name: get_activity_by_price_range
description: Find an event with a specified price in an inclusively constrained range.

minprice.description: A factor describing the minimum cost of the event with zero being free [0, 1].

maxprice.description: A factor describing the maximum cost of the event with zero being free [0, 1].

name: get_activity_by_accessibility
description: Find an event with a specified accessibility.

accessibility.description: A factor describing how possible an event is to do with zero being the most accessible [0.0, 1.0].

name: get_activity_by_accessibility_range
description: Find an event with a specified accessibility in an inclusively constrained range.

minaccessibility.description: A factor describing the minimum accessibility of an event is to do with zero being the most accessible [0.0, 1.0].

maxaccessibility.description: A factor describing the maximum accessibility of an event is to do with zero being the most accessible [0.0, 1.0].

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
